job_title: PCT Patient Care Tech in Cartersville, GA
pros: This was one of the best places ive ever worked. It was short staff, but all healthcare facilities are right now. Everyone works as a team. It truly is a family environment. It broke my heart to have to leave.
cons: I dont have any cons.
